column2: "Thank you, <%me>. I can always count on you to accept my requests."
"A flight of butterflies was seen in the Floating Continent... Surely a beautiful sight, but I don't have satisfactory data."
"If I can glean some insights from the data you collect, I'll try to get to the bottom of the cause."
"I hate to bother you again, but I'll be looking forward to your findings. Thank you."
